scripts.pull-fly-volume: mkdir -p ./codegen && fly ssh console -C 'tar -czf /tmp/codegen_backup.tar.gz -C /app/codegen .' && fly sftp get /tmp/codegen_backup.tar.gz ./local_codegen_backup.tar.gz && tar -xzf ./local_codegen_backup.tar.gz -C ./codegen && rm ./local_codegen_backup.tar.gz
scripts.push-fly-volume:upload: expect -c 'spawn fly ssh sftp shell; expect "»"; send "put ./codegen_backup.tar.gz /tmp/codegen_backup.tar.gz\r"; expect "»"; send "\x03"; expect eof'
scripts.push-fly-volume: bun run push-fly-volume:pack && bun run push-fly-volume:upload && bun run push-fly-volume:purge && bun run push-fly-volume:extract && bun run push-fly-volume:clean-remote && bun run push-fly-volume:cleanup
